title: Fundamental of Basic Electrical Circuits
headline: The free online course on the interconnection of circuits as well as using mesh and nodal analysis in circuit analysis.
description: This free online fundamentals of basic electrical circuits course will teach you about the interconnection of electrical circuits, as well as the use of Kirchoff's laws and the importance of the capacitor-inductor phasor relationship.You will also learn about the use of mesh and nodal analysis in the analysis of various electrical circuits, and the important techniques which are used in finding the solution for different electrical circuits.
courseDescription:
In this course, you will learn about the various electrical circuits that can be interconnected, as well as how these connections are applied. The concepts and definitions of some electrical elements like resistance and capacitance and both of Kirchhoffâ€™s laws will also be covered in the course. Then, the course will teach you about sinusoids, the various voltage division concepts, and the capacitor-inductor phasor relationship.

Then, this course will teach you about carrying out the mesh and nodal analysis for various electrical circuits. The topology of electrical circuits, as well as the various important techniques that are used in solving different electrical circuits, will also be covered in the course. Lastly, the course will teach you about the operations of different electrical circuits with dependent and independent current sources.

This course is helpful for learners who want to understand the basic operating principles of electrical circuits, as well as how these electrical circuits are interconnected. The learners will also gain an understanding of the various techniques that will be useful when carrying out circuit analysis and finally solving these electrical circuits. Begin this course now to learn about the various elements of an electrical circuit and the importance of each element.
